definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Blanch celery and carrot in boiling water. Drain.
sentences.chinese: 西芹及甘笋放入沸水中略煮，沥干。

sentences.english: This is basically Parsley pesto and accompanies the large steak you’ve just ordered.
sentences.chinese: 这基本上就是用来搭配大肉排的西芹酱。

sentences.english: Tarragon cured salmon carpaccio, lightly smoked, Williams pear puree, organic celery shoots.
sentences.chinese: 龙蒿草烟熏三文鱼薄片，威廉生梨酱，有机西芹苗。

sentences.english: Add the celery, carrots, salt and pepper to the pot.
sentences.chinese: 加入西芹，胡萝卜，盐和胡椒。

sentences.english: The twins are fond of ginger and parsley.
sentences.chinese: 双子座比较喜欢姜和西芹口味。

sentences.english: Trim Honshimeji mushrooms, cut celery into diamond shape.
sentences.chinese: 修切本菇，西芹切成榄角形。

sentences.english: Sprinkle with almonds and chopped parsley.
sentences.chinese: 然后捞出盛盘，撒上杏仁及西芹块即可。

sentences.english: Arrange it on top of the celeriac cake. Cover with sherry sauce.
sentences.chinese: 把切开的鸡肉放在西芹根蛋糕上，浇上雪梨酒酱汁。

sentences.english: Parboil celery and carrot in boiling water. Drain.
sentences.chinese: 西芹及甘笋放入沸水中略煮，沥干。

sentences.english: Egg white taste very soft, while carrot and celery are still crunchy . Good mix.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白软绵绵，和爽口的甘笋西芹很夹。

definition: Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
